data.name: Backlash
data.description: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for 250 elemental damage over 5 seconds to anyone who hits you.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brush Off
data.description: Increases your chance to disrupt enemy magic by 10%.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Grants a 160 unique bonus to strength

data.name: Bypass Defenses
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You charge into the thick of battle, increasing your run speed by 50% for 7 seconds. If you use any abilities, this effect will immediately end.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Any time you strike an enemy in melee with a direct attack, you will receive 25% less damage from ranged and magical attacks for 2 second. This effect will not stack with other damage reductions.

data.name: Concussive Jolt
data.description: A great wave of concussive force knocks down all targets 25 feet in front of you for 2 seconds, inflicting X physical damage.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to dodge and parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Convulsive Slashing
data.description: You continually slice at an enemy for up to 3 seconds, striking them up to 6 times and dealing X phyical damage per hit. Each strike has a 50% chance to remove a blessing or enchantment from the enemy and deal Y additional physical damage. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Regenerative Mutations
data.description: Whenever you trigger the effects of any of your Mutations, you will be healed for X every second for 5 seconds.

data.name: Corruption
data.description: Corruption spreads to your target, dealing X physical damage and your target takes a (rank * 3) ability penalty to toughness for 20 seconds.

data.name: Crushing Blows
data.description: While you are using the Gift Of Monstrosity, all of your hits have a 25% chance to remove 225 points of morale from the enemy.

data.name: Cutting Claw
data.description: Claw attack that deals X physical damage and causes the target to take a (rank * 40) ability penalty to armor for 10 seconds.

data.name: Deadly Clutch
data.description: Tainted Claw will now reduce all healing used on the victim by 50%. Additionally, you will be healed for 50% of the heals actually received by the target.

data.name: Death Grip
data.description: Disarms your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use melee or ranged weapons.

data.name: Debilitate
data.description: A deliberate attack that inflicts X phyical damage and cripples your target, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Deeply Impaled
data.description: Any time you Impale an enemy, they will become 10% more susceptible to being critically hit for 15 seconds.

data.name: Demolition
data.description: A widespread attack that inflicts X physical damage to all targets up to 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Draining Swipe
data.description: You quickly rake your target twice, dealing X physical damage with each hit. The victim will regain action points 50% more slowly for 9 seconds.

data.name: Energy Ripple
data.description: A large burst of power courses through you, dealing 1800 damage to all targets within 30 feet, knocking down all targets around you for 3 seconds.

data.name: Exhaustive Strikes
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, their action point cost will be increased by 50% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Feeding On Fear
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your chance to critically hit will be increased by 20% for 5 seconds, but you will also become 10% more susceptible to being critically hit.

data.name: Ferocious Assault
data.note: Requires Gift of Brutality or Monstrosity
data.description: Chaotic winds and daemonic fury combine for 20 seconds. With Gift of Monstrosity, you will gain a (Rank * 10) ability bonus to toughness. With Gift of Brutality, you will gain a (Rank * 10) ability bonus to strength.

data.name: Flail
data.description: Swipes opponent for X physical damage. If mutated, will hit an additional time for Y phyical damage.

data.name: Flames of Fate
data.description: Your target is engulfed in the chaotic flames of fate, dealing 900 damage and roots them in place for 5 seconds.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their action aoints into yourself, and causing them to take a 160 morale penalty to strength for 30 seconds.

data.name: Forked Aggression
data.description: For 20 seconds, all damage dealt to you is mirrored back to the attacker with a 50% boost.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Gift of Brutality
data.description:
You are imbued with the Gift of Brutality, warping and twisting the flesh of your arm into a brutal blade.

While mutated, your attacks have a 25% chance to fill you with power for 5 seconds, making it almost certain that your offhand weapon will swing on every attack and increasing your offhand damage by 25%.

data.name: Gift of Monstrosity
data.description:
You are imbued with the Gift of Monstrosity, warping and twisting the flesh of your arm into a vicious club.

While mutated, your attacks have a 25% chance to empower you for 5 seconds, granting you 50% reduced armor penetration and a (Rank *3) unique bonus to toughness.

data.name: Gift of Release
data.description: Releases your current mutation.

data.name: Gift of Savagery
data.description:
You are imbued with the Gift of Savagery, warping and twisting the flesh of your arm into a savage claw.

While mutated, your attacks have a 25% chance to deal an additional X physical damage over 5 seconds, and reduce the victim's autoattack speed by 33%.

data.name: Great Fang
data.description: A mighty swing attack that inflicts 450 damage to all targets 40 feet in front of you and causes them to take a 180 morale penalty to wounds for 10s

data.name: Growing Instability
data.description: The power of Chaos begins to take control of your body, causing all of your critical hits to deal additional 50% bonus damage.

data.name: Guillotine
data.note:
Requires Gift of Brutality
Target must be below 50% health.
data.description: A powerful blow inflicting X physical damage and will almost always deal critical damage to a weakened target.

data.name: Gut Ripper
data.description: A savage attack that guts your opponent for X physical damage, and grants you +50% melee critical for 5 seconds.

data.name: Hulking Brute
data.description: Your autoattack damage is increased by 50%.

data.name: Impale
data.description: Stabs into your opponents vital areas for X physical damage. If behind your target, ignores Y armor.

data.name: Insane Whispers
data.description: Mouth of Tzeentch will now disorient your enemies causing all of their abilities to take 50% longer to build up. Gift of Monstrosity adds this to the DoT effect. Gift of Savagery grants a 5s version of this effect.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Lashing Power
data.description: For 20 seconds, each time you are hit, there is a 33% chance that the same amount of damage will be done to an enemy within 40 feet, and you will be healed for that amount.

data.name: Mouth of Tzeentch
data.note: Requires Gift of Monstrosity or Savagery
data.description:
Tzeentch's dark words pour from your mouth, deal X physical damage to enemies 40 feet in front of you.

Gift of Monstrosity causes targets hit to take Y physical damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. Gift of Savagery will interupt all targets hit.

data.name: Mutated Aggressor
data.description: Chaotic energy surges through you, increasing all the damage you inflict by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Mutated Energy
data.description: Disrupted Magic is twisted back into the caster, inflicting X physical damage and knocking them down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Mutating Release
data.description: Your bones and muscles twist and contort to free you from any root or snaring effects. You will also be immune from all snares and roots for the next 10 seconds

data.name: Piercing Bite
data.description: All of your abilities which require a mutation will now bypass 50% of your enemy's armor.

data.name: Pulverize
data.note: Requires Gift of Brutality or Monstrosity
data.description:
Inflicts X physical damage and lowers your targets ability to parry by 10% and their ability to block by 10% for 20 seconds.

Gift of Brutality causes the target to have -10% strikethrough for the duration. Gift of Monstrosity causes the target to take Y physical damage every 2 seconds for the duration.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 action points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Rend
data.note: Requires Gift of Savagery or Brutality
data.description:
You tear into your target, dealing X physical damage immediately and an additional Y physical damage over 9 seconds. The damage over time will stack with itself up to three times.

With Gift of Savagery, the damage over time will deal Z% more damage. With Gift of Brutality, you will apply 3 stacks of rend on cast.

data.name: Rend Asunder
data.description: Increase the duration of Redn, Draining Swipe, and Thunderous Blow by 6 seconds.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for X physical damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Scything Talons
data.description: Gift of Savagery grants a 160 unique bonus to weapon skill and initiative.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Subvert Strength
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, you will regain 40 action points. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Tainted Claw
data.description: An ailing attack inflicting X physical damage and makes the victim resist 25% of incoming heals for 5 seconds. If target is ailing, they suffer the effects for 10 seconds.

data.name: Terrible Embrace
data.description: Extends a tendril of energy to pull an opposing player towards you. Monster targets will be dragged to the ground.

data.name: Throw Axe
data.description: Throwing axe that will deal X phyical damage to your prey.

data.name: Thunderous Blow
data.description: A particularly nasty blow that deals X physical damage every 3 seconds and causes the target to take a (Rank * 3) ability penalty to wounds for 9 seconds.

data.name: Plunder
data.description: Deals X physical damage to the target. If you critically hit, you will be healed for Y. This ability has +95% critical damage.

data.name: Touch of Chaos
data.note: Requires Gift of Monstrosity or Savagery
data.description:
With Gift of Savagery, spreads an agonizing rot to your opponent for 10 seconds, inflicting X corporeal damage whenever they use a melee ability.

With Gift of Brutality, Target loses control over their magic, and for 10 seconds will inflict X corporeal damage to themselves whenever they use magic.

data.name: Tzeentch's Reversal
data.description: Melee attack that deals 1200 damage and returns all of that damage as health.

data.name: Tzeentch's Warding
data.description: Grants a 252 unique bonus to elemental resistance.

data.name: Unending Horror
data.description: Increases Wave Of Horror's duration to 15 seconds.

data.name: Unstable Convulsions
data.description: Convulsive Slashing now gains a 50% chance to remove an enchantment from the victim each time that it hits them. Each time an enchantment is successfully removed, they will suffer X physical damage .

data.name: Warped Flesh
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Wave of Horror
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet are detaunted, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal against you to 50% for 5 seconds. During this time, all of your attacks will cause enemies to hate you 67% less than normal. If you attack anyone you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Wave of Mutilation
data.description: A wave of horror spreads forth from you, dealing X physical damage over 21 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet and causing them to take a (2 * rank) ability penalty to weapon Skill and initiative.

data.name: Wave of Terror
data.description: Deals X physical damage to enemies 25 feet in front of you. They take a (Rank * 3) ability penalty to strength, ballistic skill, and intelligence for 10 seconds.

data.name: Widespread Demolition
data.description: Increased Demolition's radius to 30 feet.

data.name: Wrecking Ball
data.description: Spinning in a circle with club arm extended, aimlessly inflicting X physical damage every half second to all targets within 30 feet in front of you for up to 3 seconds. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Empty
data.description: The ability/tactic that was here should be altered/removed/relaced.
